ctx: intros V W H1 E H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable E'.

ctx: intros V W H1 E H2.
apply Ord_trans with (E' := Vee W) in H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply plump with (E := Vee W); try auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> INC E' (Union E) V, W : Ens H1 : IN W V E : Ens H2 : INC (Vee W) (Vee W) Unable to unify "match Vee W with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ ?M1539 (f y)) end" with "match Vee V with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ E (f y)) end".

ctx: intros V W H1 E H2.
apply Ord_trans with (E' := Vee W) in H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H5 : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> forall E' : Ens, IN E' E -> INC E' E H4 : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> forall E1 E2 : Ens, Ord E1 -> Ord E2 -> IN E1 E -> INC E2 E1 -> IN E2 E H3 : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> INC E' (Union E) V, W : Ens H1 : IN W V E : Ens H2 : INC E (Vee W) E' : Ens H0 : IN E' (Vee W) X0 : Ens Unable to unify "match ?M2152 with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ ?M2155 (f y)) end" with "(fix F (e : Ens) : (fun E : Ens => forall E' : Ens, INC E' E -> Prop) e := match e as e0 return ((fun E : Ens => forall E' : Ens, INC E' E -> Prop) e0) with | sup A e0 => (fun (A0 : Type) (f : A0 -> Ens) (HR : forall (a : A0) (E' : Ens), INC E' (f a) -> Prop) (E' : Ens) (_ : INC E' (sup A0 f)) => (forall a : A0, IN (f a) E' -> HR a (f a) (INC_refl (f a))) /\\ (forall (a : A0) (e1 : Ens), IN (f a) E' -> forall p : INC e1 (f a), HR a e1 p -> IN e1 E')) A e0 (fun a : A => F (e0 a)) end) E' E' (INC_refl E')".

original: intros V W H1 E H2. apply IN_INC_Union in H2. apply Ord_trans with (E' := Vee W) in H2. - apply plump with (E := Vee W); try auto. - apply Ord_intro; intros. + apply Ord_trans with (E' := Vee (f a)) in H4. apply H4. apply H3. + apply plump with (E := Vee (f a)); try auto.
